sourcesContent:
import React,{Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class Service extends Component { state = { services:[] } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('data.json').then(res=>{this.setState({services:res.data.service})}) } render() { const {services}=this.state; const serviceList=services.map(service=>{ return (

{service.body}

) }) return(
{serviceList}
